entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
